responses:
Our basic table setting for events in restaurant event hall is üëá: 
Begin by placing an ironed tablecloth on the table. 
Silverware on the left side of the table begins with the salad fork on the outside, and the dinner fork on the inside. 
Silverware on the right side of the table, from the inside out, will consist of a dinner knife, salad knife, soup spoon, and tea spoon. 
All flatware should be evenly spaced, and the bottoms should equally line up. 
The dessert spoon should be placed directly at above side of table, in horizontal alignment with the handle towards the right. 
A water glass is placed above the dinner knife. 
A cup and saucer should be placed above the soup spoon and slightly to the right.
